translation: Anjyiruk th zytvnuk qsm, (yʿny yimn phln hndi pydavarkyn ʿlaqn (sham th flsṭyn) yythi varyah anbyaʿ pạd spdụ̄)
Aashi kvr ansan bhtryn sakhts pytth pạd.
Pth vvl pvt pihrith vaps bnmhi drjhi kyv lukv khoth thi bon.
Sivae tim lukh yimav ayman avn th nyk ʿmlh rvudụ̄ kran, zi tihindi khạṭr chuh suh ajr yus nh zanhh khtm gczihh.
Ps (ae nby) aamhi pth kus hykhi jza th sza kis mʿāmls mnz tohyih ankar krith?

Kya Allah tʿālyā chuhna sarive ḥạkimav khoth bvdd ḥạkim? (yylhi zan tvhụ̄ dunyakyn lokttyn lokttyn ḥạkimn nishhi thi yaczhan chihv th tvqʿ thavan chihv zi tim gczhn anṣaf krnụ̄, mjrimn gczhn sza dinụ̄, jan kạm krn valyn gczhn jan mʿāvẓh th anʿām dinụ̄, tylhi kya khyal chuh tuhund Allah tʿālyā sndyn ḥqvqn mtʿlq? Tvhụ̄ chihvh smjhan zi suh sarine ḥạkimn hund ḥạkim krinh kanhh anṣaf? Kya tvhụ̄ chihvh ts nishhi yih tvqʿ thavan zi suh kri aṣls th khrabs kunue? Kya tmụ̄ sndis dunyahs mnz chha bdtryn ʿmlh krn valyn th bhtryn kạm krn valyn doshvnụ̄ mrith khak spdun, th nh mylhi kạnshi bd aʿmạliyan pytth sza th nh rczan ʿmln pytth jza?
